name: Nova Force
description:
In a world where people have a second heart called a core, one man decided to eradicate all who did not share his core. At the same time, a group that pilots a spaceship for both people and deliveries is off once again, upon finding someone connected to this man, the battle begins. Our heroes vs their foe, the Infernal Emperor. 

Default controls
Z = Accept/confirm
X = Cancel/Open Menu on field
Arrow keys - Movement
